<!-- repo: clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk -->
<!-- ref: main -->
<!-- commit: 7a91757140d3ec99cb4e260733c9b0f36cce4987 -->
<!-- generated_at: 2025-11-17T09:31:41Z -->
# Platform: React Native

## /
- [Readme](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/README.md): Developer-facing README detailing installation, peer dependencies, React Native/Firebase setup, Clix initialization (`Clix.initialize`), user management APIs, notification handling via `NotificationService.
- [Changelog](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/CHANGELOG.md): Documents versioned release notes for the React Native Clix SDK, detailing added core initialization APIs, user management methods, push notification integrations, device/logging utilities, installation requirements, and dependency expectations following Keep a Changelog and Semantic Versioning conventions.
- [License](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/LICENSE): Defines the SDK’s modified MIT license, granting standard use/modify/distribute rights but legally restricting all substantial use to Clix services and disallowing repurposing for unrelated platforms without explicit permission.
- [Package](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/package.json): Defines the React Native Clix SDK package metadata, build/typing entrypoints (`lib/module/index.js`, `lib/typescript/src/index.
- [Tsconfig](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/tsconfig.json): TypeScript configuration for the React Native SDK, defining strict compiler options, ESNext/bundler module settings, JSX handling, path aliasing for `@clix-so/react-native-sdk` to `src/index`, and ensuring type-check-only builds with `noEmit`.
- [Tsconfig.build](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/tsconfig.build.json): TypeScript build configuration that extends the base `tsconfig`, excluding `samples` and compiled `lib` output from the build to control which source files are processed and emitted.
- [Babel.config](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/babel.config.js): Configures Babel to use `react-native-builder-bob` presets for the SDK source and `@react-native/babel-preset` for `node_modules`, ensuring correct transpilation behavior for library code versus external dependencies.

## samples/BasicApp
- [React Native.config](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/react-native.config.js): Configures the BasicApp sample’s React Native CLI to link the SDK package from the repo root, enable automatic iOS pods installation, and explicitly declare empty iOS/Android platforms to satisfy the codegen tooling.
- [Index](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/index.js): Bootstraps the BasicApp sample by initializing the Clix SDK with project credentials and DEBUG logging, then registering the root `App` React Native component via `AppRegistry` using the application name from `app.json`.
- [Metro.config](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/metro.config.js): Configures Metro for the BasicApp sample to use the repo root as a watch folder, avoid duplicate peerDependency resolutions via a blockList, remap peer deps through extraNodeModules, and set transformer options (no experimental imports, inline requires).
- [Babel.config](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/babel.config.js): Configures Babel for the BasicApp sample using `react-native-builder-bob`’s `getConfig`, wiring the repo root and `package.json` to apply the `module:@react-native/babel-preset` for building and transpiling the React Native SDK example.

## samples/BasicApp/android/app/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/samples/basic
- [Mainactivity](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/android/app/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/samples/basic/MainActivity.kt): Android entry-point `ReactActivity` for the BasicApp sample, wiring the main JS component `"ClixSample"` and returning a `DefaultReactActivityDelegate` configured with React Native’s New Architecture `fabricEnabled` flag.
- [Mainapplication](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/android/app/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/samples/basic/MainApplication.kt): Defines the Android `Application` entry point configuring the React Native host and packages, enabling Hermes/new architecture via `BuildConfig`, initializing SoLoader with `OpenSourceMergedSoMapping`, and exposing `reactHost` for the sample BasicApp.

## samples/BasicApp/ios/ClixSample
- [Main](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/ios/ClixSample/main.m): Entry point for the iOS sample app, bootstrapping the UIKit runtime and launching the application with `AppDelegate` as the main application delegate via `UIApplicationMain`.
- [Appdelegate](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/ios/ClixSample/AppDelegate.mm): AppDelegate implementation that configures Firebase, bootstraps the React Native bridge and `ClixSample` root view, manages the main `UIWindow`/root view controller, and resolves the JS bundle URL via `sourceURLForBridge:` for debug and release builds.

## samples/BasicApp/src
- [App](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/src/App.tsx): React Native sample app component that initializes the `@clix-so/react-native-sdk`, retrieves and displays device ID and push token, shows `ClixInfo` config, and provides UI flows to call `Clix.setUserId` and `Clix.
- [Clixinfo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/samples/BasicApp/src/ClixInfo.ts): Defines `ClixInfo`, a simple configuration holder exposing the sample app’s `projectId` and `apiKey` constants used to initialize and authenticate the Clix React Native SDK.

## src
- [Index](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/index.ts): Root SDK entry point that re-exports the core `Clix` client as the default export and exposes the `ClixLogLevel` enum for configuring logging across all Clix React Native integrations.

## src/core
- [Clixinitcoordinator](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/core/ClixInitCoordinator.ts): Coordinates SDK initialization state via a shared promise, exposing `waitForInitialization`, `completeInitialization`, `failInitialization`, and `reset` APIs while logging duplicate finalization and failure events through `ClixLogger` for dependent components.
- [Clix](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/core/Clix.ts): Defines the main `Clix` singleton entry point that initializes SDK services (`ClixAPIClient`, `DeviceService`, `EventService`, `NotificationService`, `StorageService`), manages async initialization and logging, and exposes static APIs for user identity/properties, device ID, push token retrieval, and event tracking.
- [Clixconfig](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/core/ClixConfig.ts): Defines the `ClixConfig` interface used to initialize the SDK with required project credentials and optional endpoint, logging level (`ClixLogLevel`), and extra HTTP headers for all SDK network requests.
- [Clixversion](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/core/ClixVersion.ts): Provides the `ClixVersion.getVersion()` async helper to read and cache the SDK version from `package.

## src/models
- [Clixuserproperty](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/models/ClixUserProperty.ts): Defines the `ClixUserProperty` model and `PropertyType` enum, providing the `of` factory for type-inferring user properties (string/number/boolean), value normalization, equality comparison, and string representation for use throughout the SDK.
- [Clixpushnotificationpayload](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/models/ClixPushNotificationPayload.ts): Defines the `ClixPushNotificationPayload` model encapsulating push notification metadata (IDs, URLs, custom properties), with a constructor for typed initialization, an `equals` method comparing payloads by `messageId`, and a `toString` helper for logging/debugging.
- [Clixdevice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/models/ClixDevice.ts): Defines the `ClixDevice` value object encapsulating immutable device/app/env metadata (ID, OS, locale, app, SDK, push/ad identifiers), with a `copyWith` builder-style updater, ID-based `equals` comparison, and `toString` for logging/debugging.

## src/services
- [Notificationservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/services/NotificationService.ts): Implements a singleton push notification orchestration layer using Firebase Messaging and Notifee, handling permission requests, FCM token lifecycle/registration, channel setup, foreground/background message handling, notification display (with images/actions), deep-link navigation, and Clix event tracking.
- [Deviceservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/services/DeviceService.ts): Implements `DeviceService`, which manages persistent device IDs, associates/removes project user IDs, upserts/removes user properties, registers FCM/APNS tokens and device metadata (`ClixDevice`) via `DeviceAPIService`, while using `StorageService`, `TokenService`, Firebase Messaging, and `react-native-device-info`.
- [Tokenservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/services/TokenService.ts): Manages push notification tokens using `StorageService`, providing `getCurrentToken`, `getPreviousTokens`, `saveToken`, `clearTokens`, `reset`, and numeric-array `convertTokenToString` APIs with bounded token history, deduplication, and error-logged persistence via `ClixLogger`.
- [Storageservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/services/StorageService.ts): Provides a typed wrapper around `react-native-mmkv` for JSON-encoded key–value storage, exposing async `set`, `get`, `remove`, `clear`, and `getAllKeys` APIs with legacy string migration and non-fatal error handling via `ClixLogger`.
- [Eventapiservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/services/EventAPIService.ts): Defines `EventAPIService.trackEvent`, which logs and posts device-scoped event payloads (with optional `messageId`) to `/events` via `ClixAPIClient`, validates HTTP 2xx responses, and surfaces failures through logged errors and rethrown exceptions.
- [Deviceapiservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/services/DeviceAPIService.ts): Implements `DeviceAPIService`, a thin wrapper around `ClixAPIClient` that logs and performs device registration and user association HTTP calls (`registerDevice`, `setProjectUserId`, `removeProjectUserId`, `upsertUserProperties`, `removeUserProperties`), mapping `ClixDevice`/`ClixUserProperty` models to API payloads and surfacing non-2xx responses as errors.
- [Clixapiclient](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/services/ClixAPIClient.ts): Implements `ClixAPIClient`, a typed HTTP wrapper around `fetch` that builds versioned Clix API URLs, injects config-based/auth headers, supports query parameters, and exposes logged `get`, `post`, `put`, and `delete` methods returning normalized `APIResponse` objects.
- [Eventservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/services/EventService.ts): Provides `EventService.trackEvent` to send sanitized event payloads (excluding null/undefined properties) to `EventAPIService` using the current deviceId from `DeviceService`, with debug/error logging via `ClixLogger` and initialization-dependent failure handling.

## src/utils
- [Uuid](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/utils/UUID.ts): Provides a `UUID` utility for generating v4 UUIDs using `react-native-get-random-values`/`uuid`, with a logged warning and deterministic timestamp/random-based fallback ID when generation fails; primary entry point: `UUID.generate()`.
- [Clixerror](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/utils/ClixError.ts): Defines the `ClixErrorCode` enum and `ClixError` class, centralizing SDK error typing, default messages, causal chaining, and factory helpers (`notInitialized`, `invalidConfiguration`, `networkError`, `unknownError`, etc.) for consistent error construction and propagation across the React Native SDK.

## src/utils/logging
- [Clixlogger](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-react-native-sdk/main/src/utils/logging/ClixLogger.ts): Centralized SDK logger defining `ClixLogLevel` and static `ClixLogger` APIs (`setLogLevel`, `shouldLog`, `error|warn|info|debug`) that gate timestamped console output by level and optionally attach error objects.
